story_12_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh, so we’re up against you, huh?
I’ve heard a lot about you—and how
you’re supposedly the new up-and-comer!
story_12_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Let’s give it all we’ve got and have a burning-hot
battle! With Shauntal and me together, you’re up
against two fiery Elite Four members!
story_12_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
“A fervent, hot-blooded pro, ready to charge...
and a fresh, young talent, poised for battle...
Flames of determination danced in their eyes.”
story_12_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
“The teams were well matched in power and 
skill...but only one could claim victory in the end.”
story_12_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Oh, I do hope it’s our team that triumphs
at the end of this story!
story_12_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
No need to hope for anything, Shauntal.
We’ve definitely got this!
story_12_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Let’s show ’em just how hot we can get!
story_12_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Right! We’ll give it everything we’ve got!
story_12_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s see how fiery your passion for battles is!
